name: parse
Set Contexts
HOT PAYLOAD
func:
msg.payload = {
    "d": {
        "gyro_x": "-0,08",
        "compass_y": "-35,67",
        "acc_y": "0,03",
        "object_temp": ""+(flow.get('too-hot')+1),
        "acc_x": "-0,02",
        "light": "476,96",
        "gyro_z": "-0,34",
        "compass_x": "-28,17",
        "ambient_temp": "24,91",
        "air_pressure": "907,32",
        "gyro_y": "0,32",
        "compass_z": "246,67",
        "acc_z": "-1,02"
    }
}
return msg;

name: CRASH PAYLOAD
func:
msg.payload = {
    "d": {
        "gyro_x": "-0,08",

        "acc_x": "0,00",

        "compass_z": "246,67",
        "acc_z": ""+(flow.get('allowed-acc')+1)
    }
}
return msg;
